text: “Nena: “Allah akudziwa bwinobwino nyengo imene (iwo) adakhala; zobisika za kumwamba ndi za pansi nza Iye (Allah basi); taona Allah kuonetsetsa! Taona Allah kumvetsetsa! (Allah Ngoona chilichonse, ndipo Ngwakumva chilichonse). Ndipo iwo alibe mtetezi popanda Iye (Allah); ndipo Iye sagawira aliyense udindo Wake wakulamula
